H0.text: In ‘Dad’s Army’, what was the surname of the air-raid warden. Mainwaring

H1.text: In ‘Dad’s Army’, what was the surname of the air-raid warden. Pike

H2.text: In ‘Dad’s Army’, what was the surname of the air-raid warden. Godfrey

H3.text: In ‘Dad’s Army’, what was the surname of the air-raid warden. HODGES

A4.text: His nemesis, ARP Warden Hodges, often refers to him as 'Napoleon'.

A5.text: Mainwaring is the one who questions Godfrey about his occupation and military experience.
